page.name: external-risks
page.caption: External Risks
page.heading: External risks are the changing market conditions and the competitive environment that affect the ability of Battelle to achieve its business objectives and strategies.

page.name: strategic
page.caption: Strategic
page.heading: Strategic risks are the adaptability and suitability of Battelle's core business strategies to the external market conditions and environment that affect its ability to accomplish its objectives.

page.name: process
page.caption: Process
page.heading: Process risks are changes in Battelle's processes that affect the business model, the ability to satisfy customers' and stakeholders' needs, and Battelle's quality, cost, and time performance objectives.

page.name: human-capital
page.caption: Human Capital
page.heading: Human capital risks are training, skills, experience, guidance, understanding of business objectives, limits to employee authority, and degree of definition in employee roles that can affect Battelle employee's ability to pursue the company's business objectives.

page.name: business-reporting
page.caption: Business Reporting
page.heading: Business reporting risks are completeness, accuracy, and timeliness of information to relevant parties or the types of decisions made on the basis of that information.

page.name: integrity
page.caption: Integrity
page.heading: Integrity risks are ethics and employee behavior that can change Battelle's reputation and image.

page.name: technology
page.caption: Technology
page.heading: Technology risks are hardware, software, systems, or personnel that affect Battelle's ability to gather, synthesize, or transmit information needed for operations and processes.

page.name: financial
page.caption: Financial
page.heading: Financial risks are the effectiveness of management of cash flows that cause changes in revenue, Battelle's economic value, and the overall stability of Battelle.

panel.body:
Have you completed the survey? If so, please click here to submit the results to Marsh.

Please realize that once you submit the results, your responses will be e-mailed to Marsh and you will no longer be able to modify the responses. If you would like to change any of your responses before submitting, please make the appropriate changes by clicking the menus on the left and then return to this Summary page to submit the results.

risk-fields.name: natural_hazard
risk-fields.heading: Natural Hazard Risk
risk-fields.text: Major catastrophe (e.g., flood, tornado) that can interrupt the day-today operations of Battelle

risk-fields.name: political
risk-fields.heading: Political Risk
risk-fields.text: Political actions (e.g., legislation, appropriations, court decisions, etc.) on a local, state, and national level

risk-fields.name: regulatory
risk-fields.heading: Regulatory Risk
risk-fields.text: Compliance with current, changing, or new regulations

risk-fields.name: technology
risk-fields.heading: Technological Innovation Risk
risk-fields.text: Management of technological advancements on Battelle's business model and strategies

risk-fields.name: marketing
risk-fields.heading: Marketing Risk
risk-fields.text: Effective and accurate publicity of Battelle's products and services both internally and externally

risk-fields.name: business_model
risk-fields.heading: Business Model Risk
risk-fields.text: Current business model's ability to meet Battelle's strategic objectives does not adequately address the changing business environment

risk-fields.name: intellecual_property
risk-fields.heading: Intellectual Property Risk
risk-fields.text: Degree of protection, or aggressive management of value on intellectual property

risk-fields.name: business_portfolio
risk-fields.heading: Business Portfolio Risk
risk-fields.text: Battelle projects, services, or clients are not diversified in source or direction

risk-fields.name: contract
risk-fields.heading: Contract Commitment/Execution Risk
risk-fields.text: Maintenance of relevant and/or reliable information concerning contractual commitments

risk-fields.name: product_service
risk-fields.heading: Product/Service Performance
risk-fields.text: Quality of product or service performance or non-performance

risk-fields.name: third_party_liability
risk-fields.heading: Third Party Liability Risk
risk-fields.text: Legal actions (e.g., litigation) from a third party regarding Battelle products, services, or operations

risk-fields.name: project
risk-fields.heading: Project Risk Management
risk-fields.text: Ability to properly, effectively, or efficiently execute projects

risk-fields.name: environmental
risk-fields.heading: Environmental Risk
risk-fields.text: Management of hazardous materials that may be harmful to the external environment

risk-fields.name: health_and_safety
risk-fields.heading: Health and Safety Risk
risk-fields.text: Safety of work environment for employees, clients, and neighbors

risk-fields.name: relationship_management
risk-fields.heading: Relationship Management Risk
risk-fields.text: Development and management of business relationships with clients, subcontractors, prime contractors, and third parties

risk-fields.name: security
risk-fields.heading: Physical Security Risk
risk-fields.text: Ability to ensure physical security of infrastructure

risk-fields.name: placement
risk-fields.heading: Placement Risk
risk-fields.text: Personnel flow into, out of, and within Battelle so that personnel with the requisite knowledge and skill sets are in the right positions

risk-fields.name: personnel
risk-fields.heading: Personnel Dependence Risk
risk-fields.text: Reliance on highly trained, specialized, or educated personnel in certain areas or projects

risk-fields.name: authority_limit
risk-fields.heading: Authority/Limit Risk
risk-fields.text: Employee understanding of or compliance with position guidelines and responsibilities established by upper-management

risk-fields.name: communications
risk-fields.heading: Communications Risk
risk-fields.text: Existence of effective internal communication mechanisms and practices both horizontally and vertically throughout the organization

risk-fields.name: training
risk-fields.heading: Training/Development Risk
risk-fields.text: Existence of effective and formal training programs to build consistent skill sets and meet employee needs

risk-fields.name: mgmt_reporting
risk-fields.heading: Management Reporting Risk
risk-fields.text: Completeness, accuracy, and timeliness of information

risk-fields.name: budgeting_planning
risk-fields.heading: Budgeting and Planning Risk
risk-fields.text: Completeness and accuracy of information relating to financial reporting and planning as well as development of strategic plans to capitalize on the current business environment

risk-fields.name: strategic_planning
risk-fields.heading: Strategic Planning Risk
risk-fields.text: Development of strategic plans to capitalize on the current business environment

risk-fields.name: regulatory
risk-fields.heading: Regulatory Reporting Risk
risk-fields.text: Completeness, accuracy, and timeliness of required financial and operating reports to regulatory agencies

risk-fields.name: investment
risk-fields.heading: Investment Evaluation Risk
risk-fields.text: Ability to evaluate investment risk of commercial ventures, spinouts and new technical platforms

risk-fields.name: employee_fraud
risk-fields.heading: Employee Fraud Risk
risk-fields.text: Employee misrepresentations (e.g., falsification of research or product capabilities)

risk-fields.name: conflict_of_interest
risk-fields.heading: Conflict of Interest Risk
risk-fields.text: Personal or professional interest of Battelle, an employee, or client impacts Battelle's ability to objectively execute duties

risk-fields.name: access
risk-fields.heading: Access Risk
risk-fields.text: Appropriate access of sensitive information of designated personnel

risk-fields.name: availability
risk-fields.heading: Availability Risk
risk-fields.text: Ability of designated personnel to access information at critical times

risk-fields.name: infrastructure
risk-fields.heading: Technological Infrastructure Risk
risk-fields.text: Formalized information technology infrastructure (e.g., hardware, networks, software, personnel, and procedures) that changes the consistency, quality, and efficiency of the way Battelle does business

risk-fields.name: counter_party
risk-fields.heading: Counter-Party Risk
risk-fields.text: Inability of subcontractor, teaming partners, etc. to perform according to the terms of a contract or joint venture agreement

risk-fields.name: liquidity
risk-fields.heading: Liquidity Risk
risk-fields.text: Ability to obtain cash and to turn assets into cash in a timely manner affects Battelle's ability to pay its financial obligations

risk-fields.name: additional_1
risk-fields.heading: Additional Risk (1)
risk-fields.text: Additional critical risks you perceive

risk-fields.name: additional_2
risk-fields.heading: Additional Risk (2)
risk-fields.text: Additional critical risks you perceive

risk-fields.heading: Additional Risk (3)
risk-fields.text: Additional critical risks you perceive

queries.query: select risk_group, risk, ibu_sig, ibu_eff, lbg_sig, lbg_eff, firm_sig, firm_eff from risk_response where pin = ? order by risk_group, risk
select system_id, ibu_sig, ibu_eff, lbg_sig, lbg_eff, firm_sig, firm_eff, risk from risk_response where pin = ? and risk_group = ? and risk_id = ? order by risk_group, risk_id

table.query: select locked, pin, job_title.caption as "title", job_function.caption as "function", location, business_unit, division from Respondent, Job_Title, Job_Function where Job_Title.id = Respondent.title and Job_Function.id = Respondent.function

select pin, job_title.caption as "Title", job_function.caption as "Function", job_location.caption as "Location", business_unit.caption "Unit", division.caption as "Division", yrs_firm, yrs_current_pos from Respondent, Job_Title, Job_Function, Job_Location, Business_Unit, Division where Job_Title.id = Respondent.title and Job_Function.id = Respondent.function and Job_Location.id = Respondent.location and Business_Unit.id = Respondent.business_unit and pin = ?
update Respondent set locked = 1 where pin = ?
